children.subject:
This is a joint infosession for a few education/mentorship-focused student orgs at Berkeley, so slightly different from CSM. 
CSM provides supplemental sections for select lower div EE/CS classes. I'm not in CSM so I'll go ahead and link their website https://csmentors.berkeley.edu/#/

history.content: Hi everyone! Growing up, we all had teachers and mentors who inspired us. It’s never too early to be that teacher and mentor to a younger student, especially during these times. This is why five of Berkeley's premier mentorship organizations have joined together for our **very first Education Clubs Info Session on Friday, January 29th from 7-8 pm!** At this event, we will each talk about our clubs’ missions, structures, and events, and afterwards, there will be time to talk directly to each club you are interested in joining! Facebook event: https://fb.me/e/66xWU6Lj1 Zoom link: https://berkeley.zoom.us/j/95213584984 Here’s a short description of each organization to pique your interest **ANova:** Berkeley ANova is a student organization dedicated to making access to computer science education and opportunities more equitable, available, and achievable for students of all backgrounds. Our outreach and mentorship efforts introduce computer science to students from under-resourced schools and marginalized communities. **BEAM:** We are BEAM, Berkeley Engineers and Mentors, a student run organization that develops and teaches hands-on science and engineering activities to K-8 grade levels at local schools. Our goal is to make science and engineering more approachable and engaging and to encourage students of ALL backgrounds to pursue classes and careers in STEM-related fields. **PiE:** Pioneers in Engineering (PiE) is a non-profit organization on campus that hosts a robotics competition each year for over 20 underserved Bay Area high schools! We are currently looking for mentors to help our student teams throughout the competition as well as staff members to work on making the competition happen! We have a lot of different projects for software, hardware, education, and more. We don’t have an application and accept students of all background, majors, and experience levels! **Project S.M.I.L.E:** Project S.M.I.L.E. is an undergrad student-run service organization that provides holistic mentoring (enrichment, social, and academic) to the middle school students at Willard and Longfellow middle schools. Through personal match-ups, our mission is to provide mentees and mentors with an opportunity to develop special relationships of respect, trust and support. As a mentor, you can also join our bi-weekly seminar and earn a unit of Education field-work! **TMC:** The Music Connection provides free music tutoring for young students in the Berkeley area. We aim to bridge the socioeconomic gap in music education by making it more accessible rather than a privilege. Join us to tutor students privately, work with students in their music classes at school, or lead weekly music-themed workshops! If you can’t make this event, no worries! Each of our organizations are hosting individual info sessions. The dates and links to those events are posted below: ANova: [Berkeley ANova Recruitment Info](http://berkeleyanova.org/join) / [Facebook Event](https://fb.me/e/cICEOT47P) BEAM: [Monday, February 1st 7:00 - 8:00 pm P.S.T](https://fb.me/e/6aW2TIxbX) The Music Connection: [Tuesday 1/26 6-7pm](https://berkeley.zoom.us/j/93903847566), [Monday 2/1 6-7pm](https://berkeley.zoom.us/j/93054300041) Pioneers in Engineering: [Tuesday 1/26 4:00 - 5:00 pm](https://www.facebook.com/events/749911722579904/) / [Thursday 1/28 7:00 - 8:00 pm](https://fb.me/e/1wMiQZTL6) Project SMILE: [Wednesday, 1/27 8:00 - 9:00 pm](https://www.facebook.com/events/1140196033069229), [Thursday, 1/28 6:00 - 7:00 pm](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fberkeley.zoom.us%2Fj%2F96086610615%3Fpwd%3DZmNqUVBiTmRLM0ZQL2RXVWZqUDd0UT09%26fbclid%3DIwAR1t_n_ENh0uY-XDKtGTX5hWzrF72iusPjYEjoaBzhwk6ZD2tam-orAQZys&h=AT0s_btl7w2d9BZ01uIr8qRonkrRaf4scBs-9jqvQiaJxQRoImu0ThEMOMu_y91auwgL_--ciFPeWSAhXtQ418AsTXi3FFld3zigZzFJPGM_POSoR7eU5XsNZWNNegYgqI42Uv3W0rNUgB5LgIuQOUYy8Q&__tn__=-UK*F)
